dcterms:creator: Q. De Smedt
H. Wannous
J.-P. Vandeborre
dcterms:description: The Dynamic Hand Gesture dataset (DHG) is captured by Intel RealSense depth cameras containing hand joint data (3-dimension world coordinate (x, y, z)) and depth map sequences. It consists of 2800 gesture sequences containing 14 gestures performed by 20 subjects, with each sequence ranging from 20 to 50 frames assigned with a class label.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Hand Gesture dataset (DHG)

dcterms:creator: G. Garcia-Hernando
S. Yuan
S. Baek
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: The First-Person Hand Action dataset (FPHA) contains 1175 sequences from 45 different gesture classes with high viewpoint, speed, intra-subject variability, and inter-subject variability of style, viewpoint, and scale. It is captured in 3 different scenarios (kitchen, office, and social) and performed by 6 subjects.
dcterms:title: First-Person Hand Action dataset (FPHA)
